item.title: ‘The Man in My Basement’ Review: Corey Hawkins and Willem Dafoe Star in a Walter Mosley Adaptation That Compels but Doesn’t Convince
item.description: Nadia Latif directs this film about a Sag Harbor man and his unusual houseguest, receiving its world premiere at Toronto.
